blogPost.excerpt: Dola is a 1-click checkout and digital wallet. Unlike Apple, Google, or Shop Pay, Dola works on every browser and device, and is platform agnostic.
blogPost.body: Dola is a 1-click checkout and digital wallet. Unlike Apple, Google, or Shop Pay, Dola works on every browser and device, and is platform agnostic.
blogPost.title: Dola (Beta) - 1-click checkout and digital wallet
blogPost.author: surgieboi

localize.description: 多拉是一款1键结账、数字钱包。与苹果、谷歌或Shop Pay不同，Dola可以在所有的浏览器和设备上使用，并且不受平台影响。
多拉是一款1鍵結賬、數字錢包。與蘋果、谷歌或Shop Pay不同，Dola可以在所有的瀏覽器和設備上使用，並且不受平臺影響。
